DocAttribute.Name: RelatingConstraint
DocAttribute.Documentation: The constraint that is to be related.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedProperties
DocAttribute.Documentation: The properties to which a constraint is to be related.

DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: A name used to identify or qualify the property constraint relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: A description that may apply additional information about a property constraint relationship.
